messages.dataNotFound: Thank you for your interest in Merck product samples.Based on the information that you provided, we were unable to verify your eligibility for the program.If you feel this is an error, please verify that the NPI number / State License information was entered correctly. You may re-enter your NPI number / State License information, or switch the search method and try again. If you used or are using the NPI number serch option, please ensure that you entered your Individual NPI number and not your Office NPI number.If you require any assistance or have any questions, please see the see FAQs page or contact us using the options listed at the bottom of the page.
